Global install.Description: Base install required to hook Special K in running applications without relying on a local per-game install.

Branches.Main: Default branch; fewer updates but stable
Branches.0.9.x:
0.9.x releases *COMPATIBILITY BRANCH*

These versions are outdated, but still available due to compatibility purposes. Use at your own risk!
Branches.0.8.x:
0.8.x releases *NOT RECOMMENDED*

These versions are heavily outdated and are not recommended.

Add thread widget, reduce GPU mon kernel overhead, allow threads to access TLS owned by other threads (dangerous -don't use!)

Branches.0.7.x Main:
0.7.x makes use of dinput8.dll as the injection method.

Users migrating from 0.6.x or earlier should be sure to delete the old version's dxgi.dll first!
Branches.0.7.x Frozen: This branch will never be updated, use it if GitHub is broken.
Branches.0.6.x and earlier:
These versions are out of date, and compatibility cannot be ensured.

Users migrating from 0.7.x should be sure to delete the newer version's dinput8.dll first!
